history.content: You can use variations like "Hi! How can I assist you today?" or "What can I do for you today?" Both are effective and friendly [1, 4].
IPv6 is the latest IP protocol designed to replace IPv4 due to address exhaustion issues. It offers more addresses and improved features like built-in autoconfiguration [1, 4].
IPv6 offers enhanced addressing and connectivity features over IPv4 [2]. Cisco provides detailed guides for configuring IPv6, including basic connectivity and addressing [1, 5].

Recursion in computer science is a method where a function solves a problem by calling itself with a simpler version of the same problem [1]. It involves breaking down a problem into smaller instances until a base case is reached [1].
